Posts.Content: Hi everyone! I saw my Oncologist yesturday and we talked about having my Port removed, He Said No not till 1 yr from the treament, which that puts me to May. I had my blood drawn like I always do and it came back where my WBC and RBC are Low and I had to be given a shot of Procrit. I have been alittle sluggish but I didn't think I needed a shot! My Hgb and PLT HCT are low this makes me very worried that something elese is gonna happen now.. I was diagnoised the 18th of Dec with BC.. But to date all clear.. Well I may be worring about nothing at all. If anyone has experianced this please let me know! Happy Holidays! Hugs:: Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Bloodwork is Low at 1 yr Ann

Posts.Content: Hello to all, I hope all your New Years was pretty good. I was in Iowa helping my mom with ear surgery,So I stayed one week after to.. My husband came in last friday night to pick me up and we were going to stay in Iowa till Sunday and come back home to Ill. We had gone to my other brothers house for a visit and was leaving there about 12:40 am when out out the blue a car ran the stop and T-Boned our Truck. I have a 1 ton Dodge Ram Dully, But she hit us so hard that it threw us to a spin and then into a retaining brick wall. Well I got banged up and my New Implant in No Longer in the spot it is suppose to be.It does hurt and I just went to see my PS yesturday. He said I have to wait 4 week before he can fix it,,, I guess the swelling??The SEATBELT had done all the damage on the RT implant.. I have lower back pain along with other milder things, All I can say is thankgod I had A BIG Truck. Good Luck to all Hugs Tammy

AgeInfo.Phrase: was leaving there about 12 40 am when out out the

Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Car Accident

Posts.Content: Hello ladies and thankyou for your concerns. Iam ok but pretty sore I have to go in and have my Rt Implant redone the first week in Feb, How sad I was all done and the twins looked Great. But due to the accident it threw one for a loop, LOL, But no really I have to have it put back in to the (Socket). Over all I am doing better everyday, Thankyou all for your love and wish's... Love to you all, Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Car Accident

Posts.Content: Please Could possibly answer a question for me? In the last yr I have gone through Lobular BC with a double Mast and on the left I had 19 Lympth nodes removed, all Neg. I had Reconstruction done and I did go through 4 rounds of Chemo, was due for 6 But The Chemo effected my heart. But anyway Iam fine all clear one year later. My Cancer was brought on by Estogen,,, 12 yrs of it. I had a hyst at the age of 30. I was put on 1.25 and that is what the dr keep me on till I noticed my breast lump.I had many Mammo's and Ultrasounds and ALL failed me too..Another story! Now my 20yr old daughter ask our same ob-gyn when she when for her check up, about her risks in BC! She is on birth control.. He said to her! and I Quote::::by the time you are in you early 40's you will have BC! I have never in my Life heard such a thing..That made me so angry for him to tell my young daughter that so now she is so scared.. Please can you tell me what you think?? Anyone out there tell me your thoughs.. Thankyou,, Tammy

AgeInfo.Phrase: <Z> <Z> <Z> Now my 20yr old daughter ask our same

Posts.Title: Bloodwork is Low at 1 yr Ann

Posts.Content: Hello to all, I had my markers done just the other day, My good doc said to me, You don't want to hear from me on Thursday! That means there was a change in my markers. Well all is well and nothing to fret about. I just got out of the hospital with celluitias on my arm that was due to a Car accident the 7th of the month. Doing better but still alot of pain.. God bless all of us warriors.. Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Tumor Markers 27-29 (For Dr. Leo)

Posts.Content: Thankyou to all that replied to my Question. My question Now Is to Dr Jay? What do you mean when you say my daughter has a greater chance developing BC because of Family Histosy? Do you mean Me? I am the Only one in the whole family that has ever had BC. So that does mean she is at a Bigger Risk now, even though my Breast Cancer was brought on by Premarin? That is what I really don't understand? Why? If I had a Hyst at a early age, No Cancer, and was put on this, ended up with BC later in the years why does this effect our daughters?? Thankyou for listening to my questions.. Sincerely, Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Question for the Drs??

Posts.Content: Hello and good evening, Well, I go in tomorrow and have my breast surgery again, This due to the car accident I was in the beginning of January. I am a bit nervous but that is only due to, that I have been down this road before and I really don't want to go through all the pain Again. If you could just put a prayer in for me at 8am that this time it goes well and i never have to do this again, I really would appreciate it. Thats alot an dhave agreat day.. Hugs, Tammy lets fight for a cure help me by pledging in the Y-Me Race against Breast Cancer.org May 08, 05 chicago Illinois My Team name is :: Chicks for a Cure.. or pledge in my name, Tammy Bengston

Posts.Content: Hey there sisterfriend, See I told you this board is truly wonderful and they all come together and help answer your questions if you have any. I am really glad you figured it out and now you are on board. Hope you are feeling better and you know I am alwyas here for you. In sister Love, Tammy

Posts.Title: New member

Posts.Content: I printed out the coupons and I do use them brands. I wanted to tell you I am going in walk in the y-me walk in chicago over Mother's Day weekend 8th in Grant Park Chicago with another Sister friend, BC survivor. So those of you that live in my area look up www.y-me.org and sign up for the 3 mile walk for Breast Cancer. Hope to me you all there. Hugs to all my sisters.. Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: Spread the word

Posts.Content: Well thankyou for the Big Welcome. Yes, I do believe this is a pretty kool place to be.. I do think you will be seeing alot of me here. I have been doing pretty well and it is almost my One Yr Ann on the 18th of Dec so I am kinda in a state, But don't know why?? So I will be looking for a whole lot of support i'm sure. Thanks again. Big Hugs to you:: Tammy
Posts.Title: Recommended Book

Posts.Content: I also have read many books sence the day last Dec 18th 03 hit me. I have Read and Read, But the book I like the best is, Why I wore Lipstick to my Mastectomy..It just hit me so hard, I remember putting on alittle makeup to go and have my Mastectomy done. So yes read that one you will like it.. Barb it is good to see you again I do hope all is well hun, Please write and keep in touch, my adress is still the same,, [email protected] Hugs, Tammy[/b]
Posts.Title: Recommended Book

Posts.Content: I am so Jelous, I wish I had a Hottie to look at when I went to the dr, But then again maybe Not,, Then I would be More Imbarresed when he did my breast surgery. Wishing you all the best and a speedy recovery... Hugs: Tammy
Posts.Title: Surgery

Posts.Content: Hi my name is Tammy, Iam 43 till Next Monday, I was Dx last Dec 18,03 with Lobular and my history is at the bottom of the page also. Iam coming up on my 1 yr Ann and I am alittle low on the blood count. But other than that doing really well. I live in Illinois and I have 2 kids that are grown 1 that just bought his own home , the other still lives here but still is in collage and works at the jobs she has had sence the age of 16. I am married and happy most of the time, But there is that 15% that I Have no idea why Iam not? Coming up on my 25th Ann on the 5th of Jan, Wow that is a long time! So there you have it. Nice to meet you all.. Have a wonderful holiday. Hugs to all, Tammy

Posts.Title: How about a roll call?

Posts.Content: Hi Hun, I had my port in alomost 1 yr ago and I am finished with my Chemo and my Recomstruction is done and things are Great! I am 43 yrs old. But the drs do not want to pull the port yet. I am a horrible stick and No veins. I have a double Mastectomy so really I can't use my arms, so there for my port is there for that... I have no problem with my port I have it flushed once a month and at that time I usally have my blood drawn too. So you see everyone has a different story in their life. Good luck to you and your Mil. God Bless, Tammy
Posts.Title: Port removal

Posts.Content: Thankyou and Bless your Heart for thinking about all of us. God be with you and I Do Hope You have a Very Merry Christams too. My heart will be with you sis.. Hugs:: Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: To Everyone

Posts.Content: Well I went to see my Surgeon today and he wants my Port removed. His thought is that Iam doing wonderful and all is over. Iam on the 5 yr treatment of Arimidex and so I do not Need the Port No longer. His worry is if a part of this breaks of inside then it can travel and go to the heart and that could be deadly. So Iam with my Dr all the way. I go on the 20th my birthday to get my nipple and tatto done and then following that the port will be pulled. Then all this will be over and done, No looking back only looking forward to bigger and better things in the future. (2005) Gob Bless you all,, Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.

Posts.Content: Well I saw my Dr yesturday and he said he does Not want the Port out yet! I asked Why and he said Not till 1 yr.. Also that my blood count is low and now they are wondering why and what is causing that. I have been out of treatment sence May.. Scared and now Worried ! Hugs to all. Tammy

Posts.Title: How about a roll call?

Posts.Content: ,Good Evening to all. I hope you all are doing well these days. I went to my PS dr on Tuesday and we have a date of Feb 23rd for my Breast surgery. Those of you that know me I was in a car accident the 8th of Jan 05 and I have Implants due to reconstruction from BC, well the seat belt did it's job and held me tight, So tight that is ripped my implant out of it's place. Now when these are put in your chest they are sewen in a pocket into the chest wall, well that is what ripped. When I lay on my back my Implant lays down along on my side, there is pain along with that. So anyway!!! I am going to have this fixed and I will have my breast look good once again, and may I add I pray to the good lord that I have No more bad luck. So I just thought I would let you know what was going on with me.. God Bless you all and Thanks for listening.. Hugs and Love to all, Tammy
Posts.Signature: Tammy 43 yrs old ,Wife to Doug for 25 yrs Mom to two kids, Comp Hyst 1/90 Ant, Post Fus 10/02,,Cerv Fus 8/03 Dx. Lob B/C 12/18/03 19 nod Neg Stge 2, ER Post. Mast lft w/expan, Rt Mast 6/03 imp. 11-03 Imp Finished .7/03 Arimidex 5 yrs.
Posts.Title: another Surgery

Posts.Content: Well my first Ann was yesturday and I kinda thought in my head it was going to be different! I also have a birthday tomorrow the 20th, so we went out to dinner last night to celebrate, I wanted to have this Big Bash! Like to Say I did it! Yes 1 year of Hell is over and I am Cancer free.. But you know it was nothing like that. The people I was with was my family and they have supported me through this whole ordeal, But I think if it was other women that was there Survivors! It would of been that big Bash I was dreaming of! Well I was kinda disappointed But only in my stupid mind.. Has anyone else thought like this or am I being foolish? Just was wandering... Thanks, Tammy

Posts.Content: Thankyou for all you thoughfulness.. I know I can count you. Yesturday I went and got my nipple put on, This is the most Awsome thing I have ever seen done, I tell you my PS is the man with the Golden fingers.. He did this in his office and was done in 1 hour, The tatt and nipple. It looks better than my own, LOL. So once again Thanks and Bless you all and Merry Christams,,,,,, Love, Tammy
